column1: Bingo Baggins (S.R. 1264-1360) was a Hobbits of the Shire.
Bingo was the youngest of the five children of Mungo Baggins and Laura Grubb
column2: and an uncle of Bilbo Baggins. He married Chica Chubb
column3: and their son Falco Chubb-Baggins was born in .

column1: In early manuscripts of The Lord of the Rings
column2: the name Bingo was used of the character that would later be named Frodo Baggins.

column1: :Five portraits are clustered on a wall in Bag End. One of them is Bingo
column2: and one of Bilbos lines when looking at the portraits is "Good old Uncle Bingo".
